chunk:
Ktchn Apothecary Revitalizing Facial Cream

Brand: Ktchn Apothecary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf (Aloe Vera) Juice, Aqua, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Botanical Glycerol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Honeycomb Extract), Avena Sativa (Colloidal Oats), Lactobacillus, Rosa Canina

Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Botanical Glycerol, Lactobacillus Ferment, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cera Alba (Honeycomb Extract), Avena Sativa (Colloidal Oats), Lactobacillus, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Oil, Daucus Carota (Carrot Seed) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Essential Oil of Lavender) Oil, (Vitamin C) Ascorbic Acid, Gluten-Free Xanthan

(Colloidal Oats), Lactobacillus, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Oil, Daucus Carota (Carrot Seed) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Essential Oil of Lavender) Oil, (Vitamin C) Ascorbic Acid, Gluten-Free Xanthan Gum, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid

Directions: Dispense 1 Pump for normal skin, 2 Pumps for dry or mature. Rub in hands, massage on face, neck & d collet . Apply in the AM & PM for 24-Hours of continuous firming hydration.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
